Ontario Hidden Summer Gems

Enough about rates ... Lets talk about some summer adventures within Ontario

Ontario is a beautiful province that I love to explore. There are so many beautiful hidden gems and beautiful places you should check out this month, be it alone or with your family! Let me share a few of my favourites with you!

Ontario Staycation Tax Credit 2022

Ontario residents planning a staycation in Ontario in 2022 could get back up to 20% on eligible accommodation expenses with the new, temporary Ontario Staycation Tax Credit.

Copy & paste this link for more info!

https://www.destinationontario.com/en-ca/ontario-staycation-tax-credit-2022

Deerhurst Resort

~ Muskoka ON

This picturesque golf course has stunning views and a beautiful course. Located right near the Muskoka lakes it is a beautiful area to golf as well as experience other summer adventures!

River Run White Water Rafting

~ Foresters Falls, ON

Located on the Ottawa River, is this great spot to go White Water Rafting. It is such a fun activity to do on a hot summer day in Ontario. It is an activity I enjoy a lot myself!

The June Motel

~ Picton, ON

​The June Motel is a very unique, completely renovated, boutique motel located in Picton ON. It has a very hip style with many unique features. The June Motel was featured on a Netflix series called Motel Makeover, where it got a lot of attention because of its shocking makeover. This is a place you have to check out!
